error.message: mat-icon used as interactive without accessible label. Screen readers cannot announce icon-only buttons How to fix: - Add aria-label to parent button - Add visually-hidden text - Add aria-hidden="true" if purely decorative WCAG 4.1.2: Name, Role, Value | See: https://material.angular.io/components/icon/overview#accessibility Found: <mat-icon>edit</mat-icon>

Click handler without keyboard support. Keyboard users cannot activate this element How to fix: - Add (keydown.enter) or (keydown.space) handler - Use <button> instead of <div> or <span> - Add tabindex="0" and keyboard event handlers WCAG 2.1.1: Keyboard Found: <div> (line 1)

Clickable element missing role. Screen readers cannot identify the element as interactive How to fix: - Use semantic element: <button>, <a>, <input> - Add role="button" with tabindex="0" - Add appropriate ARIA role WCAG 4.1.2: Name, Role, Value Found: <div> (line 1)
